This is a testharness.js-based test.

  assert_equals: expected 84 but got 91
[FAIL] spaces linebreak ﾉｺﾘ２４
  assert_equals: expected 84 but got 91
[FAIL] linebreak spaces ﾉｺﾘ２４
  assert_equals: expected 84 but got 91
[FAIL] spaces linebreak spaces ﾉｺﾘ２４
  assert_equals: expected 84 but got 91
[FAIL] multiple linebreaks ﾉｺﾘ２４
  assert_equals: expected 84 but got 91
[FAIL] multiple linebreaks + spaces ﾉｺﾘ２４
  assert_equals: expected 84 but got 91
[FAIL] linebreak only ２４ｺ
  assert_equals: expected 60 but got 67
[FAIL] spaces linebreak ２４ｺ
  assert_equals: expected 60 but got 67
[FAIL] linebreak spaces ２４ｺ
  assert_equals: expected 60 but got 67
[FAIL] spaces linebreak spaces ２４ｺ
  assert_equals: expected 60 but got 67
[FAIL] multiple linebreaks ２４ｺ
  assert_equals: expected 60 but got 67
[FAIL] multiple linebreaks + spaces ２４ｺ
  assert_equals: expected 60 but got 67
Harness: the test ran to completion.
